adm:managed-object.name: error-log-account-status-notification-handler
adm:managed-object.adm:synopsis: is an account status notification handler that writes information about status notifications using the Directory Server's error logging facility.

adm:property.name: account-status-notification-type
adm:property.adm:synopsis: is a possible event type that can trigger an account status notification.

adm:value.name: account-temporarily-locked
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Indicates that an account status message should be generated whenever a user account has been temporarily locked after too many failed attempts.

adm:value.name: account-permanently-locked
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Indicates that an account status message should be generated whenever a user account has been permanently locked after too many failed attempts.

adm:value.name: account-unlocked
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Indicates that an account status message should be generated whenever a user account has been unlocked by an administrator.

adm:value.name: account-idle-locked
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Indicates that an account status message should be generated whenever a user account has been locked because it was idle for too long.

adm:value.name: account-reset-locked
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Indicates that an account status message should be generated whenever a user account has been locked because it the password had been reset by an administrator but not changed by the user within the required interval.

adm:value.name: account-disabled
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Indicates that an account status message should be generated whenever a user account has been disabled by an administrator.

adm:value.name: account-enabled
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Indicates that an account status message should be generated whenever a user account has been enabled by an administrator.

adm:value.name: account-expired
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Indicates that an account status message should be generated whenever a user authentication has failed because the account has expired.

adm:value.name: password-expired
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Indicates that an account status notification message should be generated whenever a user authentication has failed because the password has expired.

adm:value.name: password-expiring
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Indicates that an account status notification message should be generated the first time that a password expiration warning is encountered for a user password.

adm:value.name: password-reset
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Indicates that an account status notification message should be generated whenever a user's password is reset by an administrator.

adm:value.name: password-changed
adm:value.adm:synopsis: Indicates whether an account status notification message should be generated whenever a user changes his/her own password.
